summary: This is an email forwarding a message from Matthew Goldstein of The New York Times regarding the publication of Jeffrey Epstein's financial statements online and a related news story about his estate.

persons.name: Matthew Goldstein
persons.context: Author of the forwarded email from The New York Times, announcing the posting of Epstein's financial statements online and a related story.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The deceased financier whose financial statements and estate are the subject of the posted documents and news story.

connections.description: Goldstein, a journalist for The New York Times, is reporting on and publishing documents related to Epstein's finances and estate.

events.title: Publication of Epstein Financials and Story
events.description: Matthew Goldstein of The New York Times posts Jeffrey Epstein's financial statements online and publishes a related story about his estate.

keyFacts: Financial statements related to Jeffrey Epstein were posted online by The New York Times on October 14, 2019.
A related news story about Jeffrey Epstein's estate was published by The New York Times on the same date.
The document is an internal email forwarding a journalist's announcement about the publication of these materials.
